name: Ryan Alverdes
text: I had the best pizza I have had in years (yes, really, yes at Pizza Schmizza, yes I have the right place, no I'm not currently mentally unstable).  I tried to get it again (the No Kiss Tonight) at another location, and it wasn't nearly as â€¦More

text: Iâ€™ve loved Schmizza since 04. Living in nyc for the last decade but still a big fan. The bat mobile at this one... classic. â€¦More

text: Consistently yummy pizza complimented with great service ðŸ˜ƒ

text: That was the worst ranch Iâ€™ve ever tasted it tasted like eggs and the pizza was squishy and not good

name: christina cudworth
text: Wish there were more Schmizzas around. I love that they have by the slice and whole options. The pasta is great as well!! Super fun decor.

name: Billy Lewnes
text: There were 2 ladies working this particular afternoon. The pizza was fantastic. The customer service was great. And the young woman with dark short hair was taking our order and i have to say when she smiled it lit up my world instantly. Food was great. The prices were good. The customer service was great too.

name: Jonathan Nosack
text: We ordered 3 slices-they brought out completely burnt pizza and said it was "extra crispy". I asked for it to be re done and when they brought it back out it was still burnt. Maybe oven issues? â€¦More

name: Lauren Sedra
text: It takes them close to an hour to make a pizza. Donâ€™t listen to them when you call ahead and they say 20 minutes!

name: Chelsea Ebert
text: My favorite pizza place!! It's consistently good every time I go in. I always get pepperoni, but they have lots of neat options to choose from. Very fun decorations as well.

name: Brian Smith
text: A descent little Schmizza, reminiscent of the old Schmizza that uses to be in Sherwood. Quirky decor and quick service. Pizza is good, not the best, but good enough for a quick slice of pizza gratitude when you need it.

name: Fabrice Paillet
text: Good Pizza. Better for pick up than eating on site.

name: Devon and Al Warkiser
text: Some really good pizza and a quirky enjoyable atmosphere. Ever so slightly pricy but really worth it in my mind. Very thin but flavorful.

name: Jean Gutierrez
text: Personally always a good place to stop by, have a slice of pizza, watch the game and relax (: â€¦More

name: Jackie Pham
text: Good variety of slices to choose from! The crust and sauce is sooooo goood! I love it! Didn't take long for the pizzas to warm up with a nice crunchy crust! The server was super nice and funny. Well kept and clean!

name: mark baez
text: Great service

name: Erik Wohlgemuth
text: The pizza is good but they nickel and dime you. My friend's kid ordered plain pasta and they charged the same amount as if it was a adult size entree. When we ordered a drink two slices of pizza and drink, they charged us a la carte rather â€¦More

name: Chris T.
text: It you want a slice and a soda, or a whole pie, great place.

name: Jim Mitchener
text: DO NOT ORDER ONLINE. We ordered pizza online and promptly got a confirmation text message. When we showed up to pick it up there was almost no one in the restaurant and they took about 10 minutes to get to us behind the counter. They then â€¦More

name: B DeWeese
text: Good pizza great service.

name: Vaibhav Bedekar
text: Too good pizza

name: Michael Nelson
text: Schmizza is always delicious and I'm picky...

name: Cliff Sapienza
text: Great service good food . Brought my 6 man crew and me for lunch it was only 56.00. I would go back again .

text: Good value and the employees are always really friendly for lunch.

name: Kristen Plosay
text: Always a great experience when I'm there. No complaints.

name: We Like Women Pride Army

name: AIRJORD23N
text: Terrible location , old man up front is rude and only says "other stores offer that but we don't , he doesn't offer any discount for multiple pitches of slices , he offers no slice of the day and no customer incentives , the location is definitely not hip or up to the standards of other pizza schmizza locations
